survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employees' habits and preferences regarding digital detox practices in the workplace to promote better work-life balance and mental health.

questions.question_text: How often do you engage in digital detox practices during work hours (e.g., no screens during breaks, turning off notifications)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.
